description: List material site subscriptions with filtering.
permissions: Admins can list all material site subscriptions. Non-admin users can list subscriptions for material sites belonging to material suppliers or brokers they are members of (per policy scope).
validation_notes: contact-method filter must be one of: email_address, mobile_number. user and material-site filters accept comma-separated IDs.

flags.name: --user
flags.description: Filter by user ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --material-site
flags.description: Filter by material site ID (comma-separated for multiple)
